short_description: Enhances breast size using implants or fat transfer.
overview: Breast augmentation involves increasing the size or enhancing the shape of breasts using implants or fat grafting.
procedure_details: Performed under general anesthesia; involves placing silicone or saline implants or injecting fat tissue into breasts.
ideal_candidates: Women with small or asymmetrical breasts, post-pregnancy changes.
recovery_process: Bandages, support bra for weeks, swelling and soreness common, resume work in 7–10 days.
benefits_detailed: Enhances body proportion, restores breast volume lost after weight reduction or pregnancy.
procedure_types: Silicone Implants, Saline Implants, Fat Grafting
alternative_procedures: Fat transfer breast augmentation, breast lift

alternative_names: Tummy Tuck, Belly Fat Removal Surgery
short_description: Removes excess skin and fat, tightens abdominal muscles.
overview: A tummy tuck improves abdominal contour by removing excess skin and fat, and tightening abdominal muscles.
procedure_details: Full or mini abdominoplasty depending on extent. Involves incision from hip to hip, muscle tightening, skin removal.
ideal_candidates: Individuals with loose skin post-pregnancy or weight loss.
recovery_process: Drains may be placed, compression garments recommended, avoid strenuous activity for 4–6 weeks.
benefits_detailed: Removes stubborn fat and excess skin, tightens muscles for better abdominal shape.
risks: Scarring, infection, seroma, poor wound healing.
procedure_types: Full Tummy Tuck, Mini Tummy Tuck

short_description: Enhances buttocks using fat transfer from other areas.
overview: A BBL involves liposuction of fat from areas like the abdomen or thighs, then injecting purified fat into the buttocks.
procedure_details: Fat is harvested via liposuction, processed, and strategically injected into buttocks for volume and shape.
ideal_candidates: People with enough fat for harvesting and seeking natural butt enhancement.
recovery_process: Must avoid sitting directly on buttocks for 2–3 weeks; use special pillow.
benefits_detailed: Utilizes patient's own fat, no foreign implants, improves contour of donor areas too.
risks: Fat reabsorption, infection, asymmetry, fat embolism.

short_description: Reshapes the nose for aesthetic or functional reasons.
overview: Rhinoplasty modifies nasal shape for cosmetic reasons or to correct breathing issues or trauma deformities.
procedure_details: Open or closed technique; cartilage reshaping, bone trimming or grafting may be done.
ideal_candidates: Individuals with nasal asymmetry, humps, or breathing problems.
recovery_process: Swelling, bruising around eyes, nasal splint for 1 week, avoid impact for 6 weeks.
benefits_detailed: Enhances profile, corrects structural defects, boosts confidence.
risks: Bleeding, infection, breathing issues, dissatisfaction with results.

alternative_names: Post-Pregnancy Body Makeover, Mommy Surgery Combo
short_description: Combo of procedures to restore pre-pregnancy body.
overview: A mommy makeover customizes a set of surgeries like breast lift, tummy tuck, and liposuction to address post-pregnancy body changes.
procedure_details: Typically performed in one session under general anesthesia; involves multiple procedures tailored to the patient’s goals.
ideal_candidates: Mothers who have finished childbearing and want to restore their body.
recovery_process: Hospital stay may be required, rest for 2 weeks, compression garments, limited activity for a month.
benefits_detailed: Offers full-body restoration including lifted, youthful breasts, a flatter and more toned abdomen, reduced fat pockets, and improved body contours — all tailored to post-pregnancy changes. Restores confidence, enhances comfort in clothing, and reduces physical strain caused by sagging tissues.
risks: Combined surgery risks: bleeding, infection, longer recovery.

alternative_names: Reduction Mammoplasty, Reduction of Large Breasts
short_description: Reduces breast size and alleviates discomfort.
overview: A breast reduction involves the removal of excess tissue, skin, and fat to decrease breast size and improve comfort.
procedure_details: Incisions made around the areola, down the breast, and in the fold. Excess tissue and fat are removed.
ideal_candidates: Women with large, heavy breasts causing physical discomfort or health problems.
recovery_process: Compression garments, limited physical activity, avoid heavy lifting for 4–6 weeks.
benefits_detailed: Alleviates back pain, shoulder pain, and skin irritation by reducing breast size.
risks: Scarring, infection, changes in nipple sensation, asymmetry.

alternative_names: Silicone Implants, Saline Implants, Breast Augmentation
short_description: Increases breast size or changes shape.
overview: Breast implants are used to enhance breast size and shape, offering a more youthful and fuller breast appearance.
procedure_details: Silicone or saline implants are placed behind the breast tissue or chest muscles.
ideal_candidates: Women seeking increased breast size or restoration of breast volume.
recovery_process: Swelling and soreness common, rest for 1–2 weeks, avoid strenuous activity for 4–6 weeks.
benefits_detailed: Increases breast size, restores volume, and creates a more youthful appearance.
risks: Infection, capsular contracture, implant rupture, dissatisfaction.

short_description: Corrects sagging or puffiness around the eyes.
overview: Eyelid surgery rejuvenates the eyes by removing excess skin, fat, or muscle to create a more youthful, awake appearance.
procedure_details: Incisions are made along the natural creases of the eyelids to remove excess skin or fat.
ideal_candidates: Individuals with sagging or puffy eyelids seeking a more youthful appearance.
recovery_process: Avoid makeup for 1–2 weeks, swelling may last for a few weeks.
benefits_detailed: Improves the appearance of droopy, tired eyes, making them appear more awake and refreshed.
risks: Infection, dry eyes, scarring, difficulty closing eyes.

short_description: Removes unwanted fat from specific areas of the body.
overview: Liposuction targets stubborn fat deposits and sculpts body contours by removing fat through suction.
procedure_details: Small incisions are made, and fat is removed using a suction device.
ideal_candidates: Individuals with localized fat pockets or areas resistant to diet and exercise.
recovery_process: Compression garments recommended, avoid strenuous activity for 4–6 weeks.
benefits_detailed: Reduces fat in targeted areas, offering a more toned and sculpted appearance.

short_description: Lifts and enhances breasts using implants.
overview: A breast lift with implants combines a breast lift and the placement of implants for a more youthful, fuller breast shape.
procedure_details: Involves lifting the breast tissue and placing silicone or saline implants for volume. Incisions made around the areola or in the breast fold.
ideal_candidates: Women with sagging or deflated breasts, desiring more volume.
recovery_process: Swelling, bruising common, compression garment, avoid heavy lifting for 4–6 weeks.
benefits_detailed: Combines breast enhancement with volume and a lifted, youthful appearance.

short_description: Injectable filler to reduce wrinkles and add volume.
overview: Juvederm is a hyaluronic acid-based dermal filler that smooths wrinkles and adds volume to areas such as the cheeks, lips, and under the eyes.
procedure_details: The filler is injected into targeted areas to smooth wrinkles, restore volume, and enhance facial contours.
ideal_candidates: Individuals with deep wrinkles, volume loss, or facial asymmetry.
recovery_process: Avoid massaging treated areas, no strenuous activities for 24–48 hours.
benefits_detailed: Restores volume, enhances facial features, and smooths wrinkles.
risks: Bruising, swelling, asymmetry, lumps, allergic reactions (rare).

short_description: Minimally invasive laser liposuction.
overview: Smart Lipo uses laser energy to liquefy fat, which is then suctioned out, while also tightening skin and improving contours.
procedure_details: Laser energy targets and liquefies fat before it's gently removed, with minimal discomfort.
ideal_candidates: Individuals with localized fat deposits, desiring less invasive liposuction.
recovery_process: Avoid strenuous activity for 2 weeks, use compression garments for 4–6 weeks.
benefits_detailed: Removes fat and tightens skin for enhanced body shape with minimal downtime.

short_description: Increases lip volume and shape.
overview: Lip fillers add volume to the lips, smooth fine lines, and enhance overall lip shape with hyaluronic acid or collagen-based injectables.
procedure_details: Fillers are injected directly into the lips to provide plumpness and smoothness.
ideal_candidates: Individuals seeking fuller lips or correction of lip asymmetry.
recovery_process: Avoid pressure on treated areas, avoid makeup for 24 hours.
benefits_detailed: Enhances lip volume, smooths lines, and improves lip contour.
risks: Bruising, swelling, asymmetry, lumps, allergic reactions (rare).

short_description: Rejuvenates the lower face and neck.
overview: A lower facelift targets sagging jowls and neck skin, tightening the lower face and improving jawline definition.
procedure_details: Involves lifting and tightening the skin and muscles from the chin to the neck and jaw.
ideal_candidates: Individuals with sagging jowls and neck skin.
recovery_process: Avoid strenuous activities, wear a compression garment for 4–6 weeks, and limit sun exposure.
benefits_detailed: Restores lower facial contours, smooths jowls, and tightens neck for a youthful look.
risks: Scarring, nerve damage, infection, unsatisfactory results.

short_description: Reconstructs the breast after mastectomy.
overview: Breast reconstruction creates a new breast shape for women who have had a mastectomy, using implants or tissue from other parts of the body.
procedure_details: Involves the use of implants or autologous tissue to create a natural-looking breast.
ideal_candidates: Women who have undergone mastectomy due to breast cancer.
recovery_process: Compression garments, multiple surgeries may be required, gradual results.
benefits_detailed: Reconstructs natural breast shape and restores appearance after mastectomy.

short_description: Combines radiofrequency & ultrasound for tightening and contouring.
overview: Delivers RF and ultrasound energy to heat tissues, promoting collagen and reducing localized fat.
procedure_details: In-office; ~30–60 mins; no anesthesia
ideal_candidates: People with mild skin laxity or small fat pockets
recovery_process: No downtime; return to normal activity immediately
benefits_detailed: Collagen stimulation with fat reduction for improved appearance

short_description: RF energy + microneedles for collagen, scar, and texture improvement.
overview: RF is delivered through microneedles deep into skin to target acne scars, wrinkles, and skin laxity.
procedure_details: Topical numbing; ~45 minutes per session; 3+ sessions typical
ideal_candidates: People with acne scars, aging skin, or laxity
recovery_process: Redness/swelling 1–3 days; gentle skincare recommended
results_duration: Long-term; visible in 3–6 weeks; up to 12 months
benefits_detailed: Combines RF and microneedling to remodel collagen and elastin

short_description: Temporary balloon fills stomach to reduce hunger and promote weight loss.
overview: A saline-filled balloon is inserted endoscopically to limit food intake and assist with weight loss.
procedure_details: Outpatient, sedation; ~20 mins for placement; 6-month duration
ideal_candidates: BMI 30–40 patients needing non-surgical weight loss
recovery_process: Liquid diet first days; gradual reintroduction of solid foods
results_duration: Weight loss over 6 months; lifestyle changes extend results
benefits_detailed: Promotes portion control and appetite reduction

short_description: Gentle water-jet assisted fat removal with less trauma than traditional lipo.
overview: Uses a pressurized saline stream to loosen fat cells for easy, less traumatic suction and smoother outcomes.
procedure_details: Local/general anesthesia; 30 mins–1 hr; depends on area
ideal_candidates: People seeking body contouring with reduced downtime
recovery_process: Compression garments advised; mild discomfort for a few days
benefits_detailed: Less damage to tissue and vessels, enabling quicker recovery and smoother results

short_description: Combines microneedling with radiofrequency energy.
overview: Uses insulated needles to deliver RF into dermis, tightening and smoothing skin.
procedure_details: Local numbing; small needles puncture skin and deliver RF heat; 3–4 sessions typical.
ideal_candidates: People with acne scars, laxity, texture issues.
recovery_process: Redness subsides in 1–2 days; sunscreen and gentle skin care needed.
benefits_detailed: RF boosts collagen deeper than traditional microneedling.

short_description: Treatment to elevate drooping eyelids using a prescription solution.
overview: Upneeq is a prescription eye drop that lifts the upper eyelid.
procedure_details: A simple eye drop is applied to the eyelid, providing a lift by stimulating the muscles to contract.
ideal_candidates: Individuals with ptosis or droopy eyelids.
recovery_process: Avoid rubbing the eyes; mild irritation may occur, but this resolves quickly.
benefits_detailed: Temporary treatment that lifts droopy eyelids with no surgery.

short_description: Corrects hardened breast implants due to scar tissue.
overview: Addresses the formation of tight scar tissue (capsule) around breast implants that causes hardness or pain.
procedure_details: Options include capsulectomy (removal of capsule), capsulotomy (incision), or implant replacement.
ideal_candidates: Patients with hardened, painful or misshapen implants.
recovery_process: Compression, rest, limited activity; implant revision may be required.
benefits: Relief from pain, restored breast shape.
benefits_detailed: Resolves discomfort and improves appearance; enhances implant longevity.
risks: Recurrence, infection, need for further surgery.

short_description: Surgical procedure for creating a neo-vagina in transgender women.
overview: Vaginoplasty is a gender-affirming surgery to create a vagina and external genitalia for transgender women.
procedure_details: Performed under general anesthesia; involves penile inversion and tissue reshaping.
ideal_candidates: Transgender women seeking gender-affirming surgery.
recovery_process: Requires post-operative care and follow-up; restrictions on sexual activity for 6–8 weeks.
benefits_detailed: Provides anatomical changes for gender-affirming results and improved quality of life.
risks: Infection, bleeding, urinary issues, vaginal scarring.

short_description: A procedure to lighten the shade of teeth and remove stains.
overview: Teeth whitening involves the use of bleaching agents to remove stains and discoloration, improving smile appearance.
procedure_details: Bleaching agents are applied to the teeth, breaking down stains and lightening the teeth’s color.
ideal_candidates: Individuals with discolored or stained teeth.
recovery_process: Avoid hot or cold food immediately after treatment; maintain good oral hygiene.
benefits_detailed: Removes stains and brightens teeth for a more attractive smile.

short_description: A minimally invasive procedure to lift and rejuvenate the neck area.
overview: MyEllevate uses a unique technique to lift the neck and jawline without the need for large incisions or general anesthesia.
procedure_details: A small incision under the chin is used to reposition the tissues and tighten the neck area.
ideal_candidates: Individuals with sagging skin or jowls in the neck or jawline.
recovery_process: Mild swelling and bruising, with results improving gradually over several weeks.
benefits_detailed: Lifts the neck and jawline to reduce sagging without surgery.

short_description: A series of surgeries or non-surgical treatments to enhance body features for transgender individuals.
overview: Transgender body contouring includes procedures like breast augmentation, chest reconstruction, liposuction, and body shaping.
procedure_details: Procedures tailored to reshape the body to align with gender identity, including fat removal, chest contouring, and body sculpting.
ideal_candidates: Transgender individuals seeking body changes that align with their gender identity.
recovery_process: Compression garments required for some procedures; recovery depends on the procedure.
results_duration: Results visible immediately, final results in 6–12 months.
benefits_detailed: Reshapes body to align with gender identity for improved self-esteem.

short_description: A semi-permanent tattoo that enhances lip color and shape.
overview: Lip Blushing uses a tattooing technique to enhance lip color and shape, providing a natural-looking enhancement.
procedure_details: Pigments are tattooed into the lips, creating a fuller and more defined look.
ideal_candidates: Individuals looking for fuller or more defined lips.
recovery_process: Keep lips moisturized and avoid sun exposure; mild swelling and redness for a few days.
benefits_detailed: Enhances lip color and shape, providing a fuller look.

short_description: A topical solution that promotes hair growth and prevents hair loss.
overview: Rogaine (Minoxidil) is applied directly to the scalp to stimulate hair follicles and promote hair growth.
procedure_details: Applied twice daily, it works by increasing blood flow to the scalp and encouraging hair follicles to enter the growth phase.
ideal_candidates: Individuals experiencing hair thinning or male/female pattern baldness.
recovery_process: Avoid excessive application; some initial shedding may occur before hair growth begins.
benefits_detailed: Helps regrow hair and prevent further hair loss.
risks: Scalp irritation, dizziness, unwanted facial hair growth.

short_description: Surgical creation of a neophallus for transgender men.
overview: Metoidioplasty involves the construction of a penis using the existing clitoral tissue.
procedure_details: The surgery reshapes and extends the clitoral tissue, allowing for functional and aesthetic results.
ideal_candidates: Transgender men seeking a functional neophallus.
recovery_process: Post-surgical care includes avoiding strenuous activity and following hygiene protocols; expect swelling and bruising.
benefits_detailed: Enhances gender affirmation through surgical creation of male genitalia.

short_description: Non-invasive laser treatment for skin tightening and hair removal.
overview: Splendor X combines laser energy to treat hair and tighten the skin.
procedure_details: The treatment uses multiple wavelengths to target hair follicles and stimulate collagen for skin tightening.
ideal_candidates: Individuals looking for hair removal or skin tightening.
recovery_process: Mild redness or swelling may occur; avoid sun exposure and moisturizing regularly.
benefits: Tighter skin and reduced hair growth.
benefits_detailed: Dual treatment for tightening and hair removal with minimal downtime.
alternative_procedures: IPL, Hair removal, Laser skin tightening

short_description: Facial surgery to feminize male facial features.
overview: Transgender facial feminization surgery (FFS) involves a series of procedures to reshape masculine facial features to achieve a more feminine appearance.
procedure_details: Includes surgeries like brow lift, rhinoplasty, lip lift, chin reduction, and jaw contouring to feminize facial features.
ideal_candidates: Transgender women seeking to feminize facial features to align with their gender identity.
recovery_process: Follow proper aftercare, avoid heavy activities, and follow a diet rich in nutrients for optimal healing.
benefits_detailed: Helps align physical appearance with gender identity by feminizing masculine facial features.
risks: Infection, nerve damage, scarring, dissatisfaction with aesthetic outcomes.
procedure_types: Gender Confirmation Surgery, Cosmetic Facial Surgery
alternative_procedures: Cosmetic Facial Surgery, Gender Confirmation Surgery

short_description: Chemical peel to treat skin imperfections.
overview: TCA peel is a chemical exfoliation procedure that removes the top layers of skin to improve texture and reduce skin imperfections.
procedure_details: The procedure involves applying a chemical solution to the skin to exfoliate and promote skin regeneration.
ideal_candidates: Individuals with acne scars, hyperpigmentation, or uneven skin texture.
recovery_process: Follow aftercare instructions, avoid sun exposure, and use moisturizers.
benefits_detailed: Reduces imperfections like acne scars, fine lines, and hyperpigmentation for a smoother complexion.

short_description: Non-surgical tightening using radiofrequency under the skin.
overview: ThermiTight delivers controlled heat under the skin to shrink tissue and stimulate collagen.
procedure_details: Local anesthesia; a probe inserted under skin delivers RF energy; outpatient procedure.
ideal_candidates: Mild to moderate skin laxity on face, neck, or body.
recovery_process: Compression and reduced activity for 3–5 days; results build over months.
benefits_detailed: Non-invasive alternative to surgical lifts; enhances firmness and texture.

short_description: Resurfaces skin using targeted laser beams.

procedure_details: Local anesthesia; downtime depends on depth; redness and peeling expected.

recovery_process: Sun protection, healing balm; makeup after 5–7 days.
benefits_detailed: Effective skin renewal with controlled downtime.

short_description: Treatment for lightening the skin tone and reducing pigmentation.

procedure_details: A combination of creams, lasers, or chemical peels that target pigmentation and lighten the skin.
ideal_candidates: Individuals with hyperpigmentation, dark spots, or uneven skin tone.

benefits_detailed: Helps lighten skin, reduce dark spots, and even out pigmentation.

benefits_detailed: Tightens skin, reduces fat, and improves body contour.

short_description: Lifts the brows to reduce sagging and wrinkles.

benefits_detailed: Restores a more youthful and alert expression by lifting the eyebrows and smoothing the forehead.

procedure_details: The treatment targets deep skin layers to stimulate collagen production, leading to smoother and firmer skin.
ideal_candidates: Individuals with mild to moderate skin laxity.
recovery_process: Avoid sun exposure and strenuous activity post-treatment; some redness may occur for a few days.
benefits_detailed: Stimulates collagen and firms skin to reduce sagging.

short_description: Professional P-Shot procedure with excellent results.
overview: Professional P-Shot procedure with excellent results.

ideal_candidates: Ideal candidates for P-Shot are generally healthy individuals seeking aesthetic improvement.

short_description: Surgical procedure to reduce excessive gums and enhance lip shape.
overview: Lip repositioning is a surgery that lowers the upper lip to expose less gum.
procedure_details: The procedure removes excess tissue from the upper lip, reshaping it for a more youthful appearance.
ideal_candidates: Individuals with a gummy smile or lip issues.
recovery_process: Avoid direct lip pressure, and use prescribed medications; swelling expected for a few days.
benefits_detailed: Reduces gum exposure, creating a more balanced smile.

short_description: Non-invasive method to lift and firm sagging breasts.
overview: This treatment uses devices like radiofrequency or ultrasound to lift breasts without surgery.
procedure_details: Energy is applied to the breast tissue to stimulate collagen production and tighten the skin, providing a lift.
ideal_candidates: Individuals with sagging breasts looking for a non-surgical solution.
recovery_process: Wear supportive bras post-treatment, avoid sun exposure; expect mild swelling and soreness.
benefits_detailed: Firms and lifts breasts without surgery.

short_description: Treatment for varicose veins using foam sclerotherapy.
overview: Varithena is an FDA-approved foam used to treat varicose veins.
procedure_details: A catheter is used to inject foam into the veins, causing them to collapse and dissolve over time.
ideal_candidates: Individuals with varicose veins.
recovery_process: Avoid standing for long periods; mild swelling and bruising may occur, but will resolve.
benefits_detailed: Reduces the appearance of varicose veins effectively.
alternative_procedures: Laser vein treatment, Endovenous laser therapy

short_description: Radiofrequency treatment for skin tightening and rejuvenation.
overview: Matrix Pro uses RF energy to stimulate collagen and tighten the skin.
procedure_details: The treatment delivers RF energy to the skin layers, tightening and firming the skin.
ideal_candidates: Individuals with sagging or aging skin.
recovery_process: Avoid sun exposure; mild swelling and discomfort may occur but resolve quickly.
benefits_detailed: Tightens skin, reduces wrinkles, and rejuvenates the skin naturally.

short_description: Body contouring treatment to reduce fat and tighten skin.
overview: truBody uses a combination of radiofrequency and ultrasound for fat reduction and skin tightening.

recovery_process: Mild swelling or redness may occur; avoid strenuous activities and use sunscreen post-treatment.
benefits_detailed: Targets stubborn fat and tightens skin for improved body shape.

short_description: Advanced skincare technology for faster skin regeneration and hydration.
overview: Hydrinity uses cutting-edge technology to accelerate skin healing and hydration.

overview: Miracu is used for facial rejuvenation and hair growth by stimulating skin regeneration.

short_description: Non-invasive body contouring treatment that targets fat and tightens skin.

overview: PicoPlus uses ultra-short pulses to treat pigmentation, wrinkles, and tattoos.

procedure_details: Laser pulses target skin imperfections while stimulating collagen production for smoother skin.

overview: EnerJet uses a high-pressure jet to deliver rejuvenating substances into the skin.
procedure_details: Delivers rejuvenating agents like hyaluronic acid or vitamins into the skin using air pressure for a youthful appearance.
ideal_candidates: Individuals with aging skin or fine lines.
recovery_process: Mild redness and bruising may occur; follow up with moisturizing products to soothe the skin.
benefits_detailed: Non-invasive method to treat wrinkles, lines, and restore skin volume.

short_description: Advanced laser treatment for hair removal and skin rejuvenation.
overview: Primelase is a high-power diode laser used for permanent hair removal and skin tightening.
procedure_details: Targets hair follicles with laser energy and helps in tightening the skin by stimulating collagen production.
ideal_candidates: Individuals with unwanted hair or skin tightening needs.
recovery_process: Avoid sun exposure for a few days and follow aftercare to prevent pigmentation issues.
benefits_detailed: Reduces hair growth permanently while tightening the skin for a smoother look.

short_description: Advanced facial treatment for skin rejuvenation, hydration, and glow.
overview: Préime DermaFacial combines exfoliation, hydration, and anti-aging technologies.
procedure_details: Uses LED light therapy, dermal infusion, and skin peels to rejuvenate and hydrate the skin.
ideal_candidates: Individuals with aging skin, dull complexion, or dehydration.
recovery_process: Redness may occur, but subsides quickly; moisturize and avoid harsh skincare products for the first few days.
benefits_detailed: Provides immediate hydration, exfoliation, and rejuvenation for a glowing complexion.

short_description: Reshaping or enhancing the chin for facial harmony.
overview: Genioplasty is a surgical procedure to reshape the chin, often to correct a receding chin or enhance facial balance.
procedure_details: Incisions are made in the mouth or under the chin, and the chin is reshaped or augmented with implants.
ideal_candidates: Individuals seeking to enhance or correct the shape of their chin.
recovery_process: Follow aftercare instructions, avoid placing pressure on the chin, and refrain from strenuous activities.
benefits_detailed: Achieves a more balanced and aesthetically pleasing chin shape.

short_description: Surgery to realign the jaw and correct bite issues.
overview: Jaw surgery, also known as orthognathic surgery, realigns the upper and lower jaws to correct bite issues, improve function, and enhance appearance.
procedure_details: The procedure involves repositioning the jawbones to correct misalignment.
ideal_candidates: Individuals with bite issues or jaw misalignment, or those seeking cosmetic improvement.
recovery_process: Follow a soft diet, take prescribed pain medication, and attend follow-up appointments for healing.
benefits_detailed: Realigns the jaw to improve bite function and aesthetics.
risks: Infection, nerve damage, difficulty chewing, temporary numbness.

short_description: Non-invasive facial treatment to hydrate and exfoliate the skin.
overview: HydraFacial is a non-invasive facial treatment that cleanses, exfoliates, and hydrates the skin, improving overall skin health.
procedure_details: The procedure involves cleansing the skin, exfoliating dead cells, extracting impurities, and infusing the skin with hydration.
ideal_candidates: Individuals seeking a quick, non-invasive skin rejuvenation treatment.
recovery_process: Keep skin moisturized, avoid sun exposure, and use gentle skincare products post-treatment.
benefits_detailed: Improves skin texture, reduces fine lines, and leaves the skin refreshed and youthful.
risks: Skin irritation, allergic reactions, mild redness.

short_description: Laser surgery to correct vision.
overview: LASIK is a popular eye surgery that uses laser technology to reshape the cornea and correct common vision problems like nearsightedness, farsightedness, and astigmatism.
procedure_details: A laser is used to reshape the cornea, improving light focus on the retina for clearer vision.
ideal_candidates: Individuals with refractive vision problems, such as myopia, hyperopia, or astigmatism.
recovery_process: Avoid rubbing eyes, use prescribed eye drops, and avoid heavy physical activity for a few days.
benefits_detailed: Corrects refractive vision problems, reducing or eliminating the need for glasses or contact lenses.
risks: Infection, dry eyes, visual disturbances, overcorrection or undercorrection.

short_description: Silicone implant procedure for breast reconstruction.
overview: Silikon 1000 refers to a type of silicone breast implant used for breast augmentation or reconstruction.
procedure_details: Silicone implants are placed into the breast to restore volume and shape after mastectomy or congenital conditions.
ideal_candidates: Individuals undergoing breast reconstruction after mastectomy or with congenital deformities.
recovery_process: Post-surgery care involves compression garments, rest, and gradual return to normal activities.
benefits_detailed: Helps in recreating natural breast form after surgery or trauma, improving aesthetics and confidence.

short_description: Surgery to correct drooping eyelids.
overview: Ptosis surgery is designed to correct drooping upper eyelids that can interfere with vision and make the eyes look tired or aged.
procedure_details: The procedure involves tightening or shortening the eyelid muscles to raise the eyelids to a normal position.
ideal_candidates: Individuals with ptosis (drooping eyelids) or those seeking cosmetic eyelid correction.
recovery_process: Follow the surgeon’s instructions for post-operative care, avoid eye strain and excessive sunlight.
benefits_detailed: Restores a youthful and refreshed eye appearance by correcting drooping eyelids.
risks: Infection, scarring, asymmetry, difficulty closing eyes, dry eyes.

alternative_names: Platelet-Rich Plasma Therapy for Hair Growth
short_description: Non-surgical hair restoration treatment.
overview: PRP therapy involves drawing a small amount of blood, processing it to concentrate platelets, and injecting it into the scalp to promote hair growth.
procedure_details: Platelet-rich plasma is injected into the scalp to stimulate hair follicles and improve hair density.
ideal_candidates: Individuals with thinning hair, early hair loss, or androgenic alopecia.
recovery_process: Avoid direct sunlight, hair washing for 24–48 hours, and chemical treatments for the scalp.
benefits_detailed: Stimulates natural hair growth, improving density and quality over time.
risks: Infection, scalp irritation, swelling, temporary hair shedding.

short_description: Surgery to adjust or improve previous breast reconstruction.

recovery_process: Post-op care includes wearing compression garments and avoiding heavy lifting.
benefits_detailed: Addresses any complications or dissatisfaction from previous breast reconstruction.
risks: Infection, scarring, asymmetry, dissatisfaction with results.

short_description: Enzyme injection to dissolve hyaluronic acid fillers.

ideal_candidates: Individuals with overfilled or undesirable results from hyaluronic acid fillers.

benefits_detailed: Quickly dissolves excess fillers, restoring the desired aesthetic results.
risks: Allergic reactions, infection, temporary swelling, or bruising.
